Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan hit 89 runs, leading India to 199/2
Sri Lanka chased 200 and were 137/6 after 20 overs
Sri Lanka lost wickets quickly, five down by the 12th over
India did not use their main bowlers for some time, giving a few overs to Deepak Hooda and Venkatesh Iyer
Pre-Game Insights: Ishan Kishan showed why he should be in the T20 World Cup squad
Expect Sri Lanka spinners to cause India problems
Post-Match Reflections: Ishan Kishan expressed learning from the last few matches and keeping it simple
Rohit Sharma praised Ishan's batting and his ability to find gaps
Dasun Shanaka said India batted beautifully and read the conditions well
Pratik commented on Bhuvneshwar Kumar's return to form
Abizar mentioned Harshal going to Australia for the World Cup
Shreyas Iyer spoke about his start and staying in the present
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ishan Kishan is the Player of the Match
This is India's tenth successive T20I win
Afghanistan and Romania hold the record with 12 successive wins
